tool_description: Exports processed weather data and analysis results to various file formats with customizable structure and metadata inclusion.

data_timestamps.description: Array of data timestamps to export

data_values.description: Array of data values to export

export_format.description: Output format: csv, json, or xml

error_messages: Array length mismatch: Timestamps and values arrays must have the same length.

usage: Specify data arrays, export format, and filename to generate formatted output files. The tool handles format-specific requirements and metadata inclusion.

output_filename.description: Full filename of exported file including extension

file_size_bytes.description: Size of exported file in bytes
